input_args.text: "All true, except... We see outrageous things printed and sworn to that are indeed outright lies. That's propaganda and we've had plenty. Being held accountable about allegations would certainly help eliminate a lot of it.\nWe need and we seek the truth. Influence peddlers pay out lots of cash to trolls from the top down. Do you give one ounce of credibility to the main stream media anymore? What if they had to research and prove all the things they allege and have to eat their headlines if untrue? See, that's what missing, an honest 4th Estate. Our news is owned by influence peddlers and they should be held liable."
